gw.api.print

Class ListViewPrintOptions.ColumnHeaderInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.print.ListViewPrintOptions.ColumnHeaderInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    ListViewPrintOptions

    public static final class ListViewPrintOptions.ColumnHeaderInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the state of options chosen by the user if the "export custom CSV" option is chosen.
